name: MuLaNEO
short_description: MuLaNEO implements algorithms to design and provision resilient multi-layer networks, i.e. hierarchies of technologies (e.g. IP/MPLS, Carrier Ethernet, SDH/SONET, etc.). It includes modelling of these technologies and visualizes their interrelations. Furthermore, it allows the dynamic provisioning of the resulting networks on the basis of path computation elements (PCE).
summary: Design and provisioning of resilient multi-layer networks
